text: I turn 20 on Monday and when I was 14 I was absolutely in love HEAD OVER HEELS FOR THIS MAN.He was my life and I probably would of died if I ever met him in real life (still would to this day) anyway I went through a phase of being a super fan of Shawn I knew every released,unreleased,live,acoustic,cover song Shawn ever posted and as I got older and started finding other musicians he kinda slowly faded out of my life over time (I still loved him but i just grew up like everyone does eventually) - I also still followed him on social media and kept up with all his music up until senorita than after that It got blurry but I was in work the other day and someone played one Shawn mendes song off his 2018 album and I instantly fell back in love and I knew the lyrics like It hadn’t just been over 5 years since I listened to the album and over these past few weeks I’ve just been re listening to all his music and falling back in love with him and remembering why I loved this man so much and this song even tho I never really listened to it when it originally came out,this is the song that made me realise how much I loved shawns music ❤️ - I’ve been playing it non stop since

text: I kid you not, this song came out the morning after I had been broken up with. (cheated on) It popped up on my spotify as I was sitting back against the wall on the bathroom floor. I usually never listen to my recommended songs and stuck to my usual ones, but for some reason I did. I was on vacation at the time so I would sit out by the pool and look up at the stars and pour out all my feelings into this song. It was on repeat for like 3 days. something about this song just starts like a chemical reaction in my body. probably one of (if not the best) song shawn has ever written!
author: Anna S

text:
Dieses Lied passt zu 100% auf uns, das macht es nicht leichter, aber man fühlt sich damit verstanden und der andere weiß was einen bewegt und was der sehnlichste Wunsch ist... glücklich zu werden, zu lieben und gemeinsam in die Zukunft zu blicken, trotz aller Widrigkeiten und Probleme.
Ich hoffe Du liest das hier irgendwie, irgendwann und wir finden einen Weg zu kommunizieren, egal wie, ich will nur wissen ob es Dir gut geht.

Vergiss niemals, ich liebe Dich so wie Du bist und werde das immer tun, weil Du mein fehlendes Puzzleteil bist und dabei so unglaublich schön, glücklich und dankbar ausschaust.

Hätte nie gedacht mal so für jemanden zu empfinden, aber es geht nicht anders; man muss Dich lieben, Du hast mich aufgefangen, mir halt gegeben und gezeigt wie schön das Leben sein kann.

Dafür bin ich Dir dankbar und dafür liebe ich Dich!!! 🥰😘😔🥺🥺🥺
❤️❤️❤️+++ 1000%
